name: The Two Powerful Ones - Windows
description:
After the death of the Pharaoh, the rulers of Upper and Lower Egypt, each lusting for more power, lead their armies and pray to their gods to win the Double Crown of the Pharaoh, and gain control of all the lands of the Nile. 

- Control the leader of Upper or Lower Egypt, and command their armies.

- Increase your favor with the gods by defeating enemies

- Construct defensive installations and send your forces to assault the enemy keep.

- Call on the power of your patron gods to assist you in battle.

- Defeat your rival and ascend to power over all of Egypt
